body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Diggs Hill. Father of William Hill, Dorothy Hill, Charles Hill, Thomas Hill, Nancy Hill, Reuben Hill, Isariah Hill, Egbert Hill, and Mary Hill. Farmer in Madison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Madison County in 1860.
